job_source.sql:
SELECT rev.commit_timestamp,
                           rs.push_timestamp,
                           rev.comments,
                           rev.repository_id,
                           rev.revision
                FROM `revision` as rev
                LEFT JOIN `revision_map` as rm
                    ON rev.id = rm.revision_id
                LEFT JOIN `result_set` as rs
                    ON rm.result_set_id = rs.id
                LEFT JOIN `job`
                    ON job.result_set_id = rs.id
                WHERE job.id = ?
